translations.With File drop, only uploading is allowe: With File drop, only uploading is allowed. Only you can see files and folders that have been uploaded.
translations.You can create links or send shares by m: You can create links or send shares by mail. If you invite MagentaCLOUD users, you have more opportunities for collaboration.
translations.This share was limited to {limit} downlo: This share was limited to {limit} downloads. There is still {downloadsLeft} left allowed.
